newsitem.title: PHILIPPINES: Meralco up by midsession on foreign buying.
newsitem.headline: Meralco up by midsession on foreign buying.

text.p: Manila Electric Co (Meralco) shares rose by midsession on heavy foreign buying as investors shifted back to reliable blue chip issues, brokers said.
Meralco A shares went up 5.00 pesos, or 4.39 percent, to 119 pesos, while its B shares, which are open to foreign investors, rose 5.00 pesos, or 2.45 percent, to 209 pesos.
Meralco B shares were the most heavily-traded stocks in the market.

"Meralco is the least controversial among the blue chips. It is the least volatile, making it the best candidate for year-end window dressing," a broker at a foreign brokerage house said. - Manila newsroom 63 2 8418938 Fax 8176267
